wikipedia_page.main:
Andrew Dykes was a Scottish international rugby union player.He was capped once for Scotland in 1932, Position: Fullback. He also played for Glasgow Academicals RFC.He played one match for the Barbarians, in 1927.His brother Jimmy was also capped for Scotland.
He was the nephew of John Dykes, who was also capped for Scotland.

response: *Andrew Dykes (rugby union), Scottish rugby union player
